Class SlidingTilePuzzle

  • java.lang.Object
    • SlidingTilePuzzle

  • public class SlidingTilePuzzle
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of sliding tile puzzles.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

    • Constructor Detail

      • SlidingTilePuzzle

        public SlidingTilePuzzle()
        Default is the 8 puzzle. Generates a random start state.

      • SlidingTilePuzzle

        public SlidingTilePuzzle(int n)
        A square shaped sliding tile puzzle (number of rows and columns are the same). Generates a random start state. For some values of n, the start state may or may not be solvable.
        Parameters:
        n - Number of rows and number of columns.

      • SlidingTilePuzzle

        public SlidingTilePuzzle(int n,
                         int m)
        General sliding tile puzzles. Generates a random start state, which may or may not be solvable (depending on dimensions).
        Parameters:
        n - Number of rows.
        m - Number of columns.

      • SlidingTilePuzzle

        public SlidingTilePuzzle(int n,
                         int m,
                         int optimalPathLength)
        General random sliding tile puzzle with specified optimal path length to goal. Puzzle generated is guaranteed to be solvable, with an optimal solution path of the specified length. WARNING: This is potentially very slow for large puzzle sizes or large value of optimalPathLength. This is due to how it generates a random instance with that specified path length. Specifically, it generates the set of all instances whose optimal path length is exactly that number through BFS, and then picks one at random. For either large dimension values or large optimalPathLength value or both, this will either run out of memory or take an excessively long time.
        Parameters:
        n - Number of rows.
        m - Number of columns.
        optimalPathLength - Length of optimal path to goal.

      • SlidingTilePuzzle

        public SlidingTilePuzzle(SlidingTilePuzzle other)
        Copies a SlidingTilePuzzle.
        Parameters:
        other - The puzzle to copy.
